member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.CommandLine.AliasAttribute
member.summary: Specifies a command line alias for a code generator.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.CommandLine.ArgumentAttribute
member.summary: Indicates a command line argument. Arguments are passed as positional parameters from the command line.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.CommandLine.ArgumentAttribute.Description
member.summary: Help string shown for the argument.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.CommandLine.OptionAttribute
member.summary: Indicates a command line option. Options are passed as named parameters from the command line.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.CommandLine.OptionAttribute.Name
member.summary: Name of the option. Usually passed with the prefix --. If the Name is not set, name of the property on which the attribute is declared is assumed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.CommandLine.OptionAttribute.ShortName
member.summary: ShortName for convenience. Usually passed with the prefix -.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.CommandLine.OptionAttribute.Description
member.summary: Help string shown for the option.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.CommandLine.OptionAttribute.DefaultValue
member.summary: An optional default value to set if user did not pass a value for this option.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.DefaultFileSystem
member.summary: Default implementation of using the real file sytem.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.ICodeGenerator
member.summary: Marker interface to indicate that this class is a code generator.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.IFilesLocator.GetFilePath(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Returns the first file found within the given search paths.
member.remarks: A recursive search is done within each search path and the file matching file with the fileName is returned. If multiple files with the same name are found in a given search path, an exception is thrown.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.IFileSystem
member.summary: An abstraction over common file/disk utilities. Intended for mocking the disk operations in unit tests by providing an alternate mock implemention.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.IModelTypesLocator.GetType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the types matching a type name. The method returns types for which the full name matches the given typeName exactly. However, if there are none exactly matching, then it returns all the types whose type name (without the namespace name) matches the given type name. This allows the callers to pass in a short type name and get the results. Caller has to decide what to do when there are multiple matches.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.CodeGeneratorInstanceCreationError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There was an error creating the code generator instance: {0}\r\n{1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.CodeGeneratorNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No code generators found with the name '{0}'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.DnuNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not find dotnet.exe on path. .

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.FileNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The provided file '{0}' does not exist. This method expects a fully qualified path of an existing file..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.FileNotFoundInFolders
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A file matching the name {0} was not found within any of the folders: {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.MethodNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} method with a model parameter is not found in class: {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.MultipleCodeGeneratorsFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Multiple code generators found matching the name '{0}'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.MultipleFilesFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Multiple files with name {0} found within {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.MultipleMethodsFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Multiple {0} methods with a model parameter are found in class: {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.NullParamError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Parameter '{0}' cannot be null or empty..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.TemplateFileNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Template file {0} not found within search paths {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.TemplateProcessingError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There was an error running the template {0}: {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.UnableToRunRestore
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to run restore..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Core.MessageStrings.UnexpectedTypeLibraryForTemplates
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unexpected type of library information for template folders.
